title: Zed walks into a bar ....
body: ...and everyone in the place stops drinking and and spits on him because he is a disgusting champion.

replies.body: But league of free stopwatch means zeds useless.

Xayah walks into a bar...

When she leaves, Rakan is by her side and the whole place smells of vomit, sweat and blood.

So romantic!
{{sticker:sg-jinx}}

> [{quoted}](name=HeartVine,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=fZ92pz7c,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2018-02-20T07:41:53.894+0000)
>
> Xayah walks into a bar...
> 
> When she leaves, Rakan is by her side and the whole place smells of vomit, sweat and blood.
> 
> So romantic!
> {{sticker:sg-jinx}}

Xayah is really fun but god damn I hate both Xayah and Rakans VO and personalities so much. Its literally just teen angst personified its rly cringy. Only worse champion VO/personality wise is Zoe for being "HELLO IM KATIE TEH PENGUIN OF DOOM AS YOU CAN SEE IM SO RANDUM!!!" tier design.

I find it funny how you use the term "angst" without considering it's meaning. Xayah is not "angsty", and there is definitely no way one should be able to confuse Rakan's personality for "angst", considering he basically embodies the opposite (kind of).

Just so we're on the same page, here's a dictionary definition, courtesy of [Oxford](https://en.oxforddictionaries.com/definition/angst):
> Angst, *noun*
> 1- A feeling of deep anxiety or dread, typically an unfocused one about the human condition or state of the world in general.
> 1.1- A feeling of persistent worry about something trivial

Definitely not an accurate description of either.

Rather than "angst", one could describe Xayah as having [sass](https://en.oxforddictionaries.com/definition/sass) (defined as "Impudence, cheek"), which can often be expressed with a sarcastic overtone, and that she possesses an intense hatred for foreign invaders (for example, Zed). As for Rakan, one might say that he's generally [distractable](https://en.oxforddictionaries.com/definition/distractible) (defined as "Easily distracted" [*duh*]), [vain](https://en.oxforddictionaries.com/definition/vain) (defined as "Having or showing an excessively high opinion of one's appearance, abilities or worth") and, dare I say, [lustful](https://en.oxforddictionaries.com/definition/lustful) (defined as "Having or showing strong feelings of sexual desire").

Jeez I'm sorry everyone can't be Zed/Darius/Rengar...

**_"KILL, KILL, KILL" 
"DEATH, DEATH, DEATH" 
"BLOOD, BLOOD, BLOOD"
"12 year old, 12 year old, 12 year old."_**

The more out-there personalities like Rakan/Zoe are way cooler in my books, it actually gives a champion personality and makes them more of a character, rather than just a game avatar. You may not _like_ the character, but thats the whole point of having different characters, so there are characters that appeal to different audiences.

But imo none top Jhin and Aurelion Sol, for cool personalities:

_"[Sigh].. I tried to like you.."_ {{champion:136}} 

_"The world is cruel... It does not have to be ugly!"_ {{champion:202}}

Zed walks into a bar...

Ouch!

thats sad 
what if teemo, zoe, or yasuo do? 
zoe would get kicked out because shes underage
teemo would place a bunch of shrooms that 1 shot everyone in the bar
yasuo would be in the same situation as zed
